statements: SELECT * FROM Suppliers
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainability_score > 4
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location LIKE 'U%'
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_name = 'ABC Corp' ORDER BY supplier_id DESC
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 10
SELECT * FROM Suppliers WHERE location LIKE '%California%' ORDER BY supplier_name ASC
SELECT supplier_name, location, sustainability_score FROM Suppliers WHERE sustainability_score > 4.5
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location IN ('New York', 'Texas')
SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, supplier_location, contact_name, contact_email FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_location='Europe';

SELECT supplier_name, energy_usage, water_consumption, waste_generation FROM supplier_information LEFT JOIN sustainability_metrics ON supplier_information.supplier_id = sustainability_metrics.supplier_id;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, supplier_location FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_location = 'Europe';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM supplier_information WHERE supplier_location = 'North America' AND contact_email IS NOT NULL;

SELECT supplier_name, energy_usage, waste_generation FROM supplier_information JOIN sustainability_metrics ON supplier_information.supplier_id = sustainability_metrics.supplier_id WHERE sustainability_metrics.energy_usage > 500;

SELECT supplier_name, energy_usage, water_consumption, waste_generation FROM supplier_information JOIN sustainability_metrics ON supplier_information.supplier_id = sustainability_metrics.supplier_id WHERE supplier_name LIKE '%Corp%' AND water_consumption < 1000;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM suppliers ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT supplier_name, metric_name, sustainability_score FROM suppliers JOIN sustainability_metrics ON suppliers.supplier_id = sustainability_metrics.supplier_id WHERE sustainability_score > 0.8;
SELECT supplier_name, location, sustainability_rating FROM suppliers ORDER BY sustainability_rating ASC, location DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name, location FROM suppliers WHERE location='USA';
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id WHERE p.price > 50;
SELECT product_name, price, supplier_name, sustainability_score FROM products p JOIN suppliers s ON p.supplier_id = s.supplier_id JOIN sustainability_metrics m ON s.supplier_id = m.supplier_id;
SELECT supplier_name, location, SUM(price) AS total_sales FROM suppliers s LEFT JOIN products p ON s.supplier_id = p.supplier_id GROUP BY supplier_name, location;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM sustainability_metrics WHERE value >= 100;
SELECT supplier_id, supplier_name FROM supplier_information WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM supplier_relations LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM supplier_information
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM supplier_information ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT supplier_name, location, contact_email FROM supplier_information WHERE location = 'New York'

SELECT s.supplier_name, r.related_supplier_id, m.metric_name, m.value FROM supplier_information s JOIN supplier_relations r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id JOIN sustainability_metrics m ON m.metric_id = r.relation_id

SELECT s.supplier_name, s.location, r.relation_id, sr.sustainability_score FROM supplier_information s JOIN supplier_relations r ON s.supplier_id = r.supplier_id JOIN sustainability_rankings sr ON sr.supplier_id = s.supplier_id ORDER BY sr.sustainability_score DESC
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 1;
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT certification_name, expiry_date FROM GreenCertifications WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM Suppliers WHERE location='New York';
SELECT supplier_name, contact_email FROM Suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM SustainabilityMetrics WHERE metric_value > 100;
SELECT supplier_name, certification_name FROM Suppliers INNER JOIN GreenCertifications ON Suppliers.supplier_id = GreenCertifications.supplier_id;
